valueProps.text: Automates every step of the tax process
Eliminate word and excel and reduce errors

proof: Clients include Alpha Pro Partners, JRBCA, Legends Accounting, Gulf School Finance, Digital Tree, Finsbury Accounting

facts.text: Tax Star is a corporate tax software provider.
Tax Star's primary call to action is 'Book a Demo'.
Tax Star automates every step of the tax process.
facts.evidence: Tax Star automates every step of the tax process - from filing and compliance to document storage and approval workflows.

facts.text: Tax Star serves accounting practice owners, tax advisors, and ERP resellers.
Tax Star offers an AI Powered Corporate Tax Calculator.
Tax Star eliminates the need for word and excel in financial statement production.
facts.evidence: Eliminate word and excel and reduce errors.

facts.text: Tax Star provides document expiry reminders to avoid penalties.
facts.evidence: Tax Star notifies you when they are due on a timely basis.

facts.text: Failure to update registration documents within 20 days of expiry results in a AED 5,000 penalty.
facts.evidence: Failure to update your registration documents within 20 days of expiry will result in hefty penalties.

facts.text: Tax Star's clients include Alpha Pro Partners, JRBCA, Legends Accounting, Gulf School Finance, Digital Tree, and Finsbury Accounting.
Tax Star automates corporate tax calculations, saving 40% of time.
facts.evidence: Save 40% of your time by automating corporate tax workflows.

facts.text: Tax Star ensures compliance and meets deadlines with automated tracking and reminders.
facts.evidence: Automated tracking and reminders keep you compliant and ensure on-time filings, every time.

facts.text: Tax Star allows scaling without adding staff.
facts.evidence: Handle 30-40% more clients with automated workflows, all without hiring additional team members.

facts.text: Tax Star centralizes client information and communication.
facts.evidence: Centralize client information and communication in one place, making it easy to manage multiple corporate tax clients efficiently.
